entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Record information about the resolved global.json usage in the SdkResolver #30711
  • Using a ref property in an instance of a WinUI 3 XAML element (e.g. Window) causes a build error since XamlTypeInfo.g.cs get's improperly generated. #30708
  • ASP.NET MVC - view component fails to render via vc tag helper when build with .NET SDK 7.0.200 #30703
  • dotnet SDK 6.0.405 and 406 still requires dependencies after installing SDK+runtime in CBL-Mariner #30694

Closed

  • dotnet restore nor nuget restore CLI command evalute the Directory.Build.props file #30702
  • Concurrency problem creating dotnet tool manifests #30254
  • dotnet tool list -g failed when run multiple times simultaneously #15399
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.2xx' #30713
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update branding to enable a hotfix release #30712
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'main' #30706
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [Blazor] Fix `publish --self-contained` for Blazor builds. #30700
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Add tests for Nuget restore post action with the argument files #30693
  • Allow multiple loggers for VSTest command #30686
    Area-DotNet Test

Merged

  • Bump Newtonsoft.Json to 13.0.1 #30691
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/7.0.1xx' #30679
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merge preview1 #30707
    Area-Workloads
  • GenAPI: add workaround for IFieldSymbol.Name that has angle brackets #30572
    Area-GenAPI
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'main' #30680
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [GenAPI] Add abstract modifier for an abstract event. #30672
    Area-GenAPI

Updated

  • #28518: Stop generating NETSDK1138 warning when OutputType is Library. #30612
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Do a two-phase publish to mimic VS behavior #29817
    Area-NetSDK
  • [GenAPI] Synthesize an internal default constructor for the type with implicit default constructor and the base type without. #30594
    Area-GenAPI
  • Introduce `Workload Clean`: Garbage Collection Component #30266
    Area-Infrastructure
